alert.note: Alert for Appling; Tattnall; Toombs; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 8:01PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jacksonville FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Altamaha River At Baxley affecting Toombs, Wayne, Tattnall and Appling Counties. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Altamaha River At Baxley. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 74.5 feet, Flooding of agricultural and timber lands is expected. Deens Landing and Linton Carter Landing boat ramps, picnic areas and parking lots begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 72.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday morning to a crest of 74.7 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 74.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
